abstract: The computer maker takes a first step toward transforming its ailing model of selling direct to consumers.
snippet: The computer maker takes a first step toward transforming its ailing model of selling direct to consumers.
lead_paragraph: Dell, in a first step toward transforming its ailing model of selling direct to consumers, said today that it would offer computers at Wal-Mart stores starting in June.

headline.main: Dell, in Shift, Will Offer PCs at Wal-Mart
